subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With the Los Angeles Galaxy in a seven-game winless streak, the team underwent a shakeup. Galaxy Coach Ruud Gullit resigned for personal reasons, and the team fired Alexi Lalas as the president and general manager, the club said on its Web site. The assistant Cobi Jones will take over as the interim coach.
